xsl.xsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor"> <xsl:template match="/"> <flt:FWTIndividual> <Name> <Forename><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_forename']/dfor:value" /></Forename> <Surname><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_surname']/dfor:value" /></Surname> </Name>
<xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_postcode']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <AddressNumber><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_addressnumber']/dfor:value" /></AddressNumber> <AddressLine><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_addressline1']/dfor:value" /></AddressLine> <AddressLine><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_addressline2']/dfor:value" /></AddressLine> <City><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_town']/dfor:value" /></City> <Postcode><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_postcode']/dfor:value" /></Postcode> <UPRN><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_c_uprn']/dfor:value" /></UPRN> <flt:Usage></flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </ContactPostals> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='tel_c_mobile']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPhones> <Number><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='tel_c_mobile']/dfor:value" /></Number> <DeviceType>mobile</DeviceType> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </ContactPhones> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='tel_c_telephone']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPhones> <Number><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='tel_c_telephone']/dfor:value" /></Number> <DeviceType>telephone</DeviceType> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </ContactPhones> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='eml_c_email']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactEmails> <EmailAddress><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='eml_c_email']/dfor:value" /></EmailAddress> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </ContactEmails> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='dt_dob']/dfor:value != ''"> <DateOfBirth><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='dt_dob']/dfor:value" /></DateOfBirth> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='rad_gender']/dfor:value != ''"> <Gender><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='rad_gender']/dfor:value" /></Gender> </xsl:if>
</flt:FWTIndividual> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="flt"> <xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data> <dfor:field>
<dfor:name>txt_customerID</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//flt:ObjectReference" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> </dfor:form-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

Action.name: headerenricher_0
Action.displayname: Add addressnumber , addressname, and postcode to header

xsl.xsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:param name='addressnumber' /> <xsl:param name='addressname' /> <xsl:param name='postcode' />
<xsl:template match="/"> <flt:FWTPropertySearch xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <AddressNumber> <xsl:value-of select="$addressnumber" /> </AddressNumber> <Postcode> <xsl:value-of select="$postcode" /> </Postcode> <StreetName> <xsl:value-of select="$addressname" /> </StreetName> </flt:FWTPropertySearch> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>propertyid</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ObjectBriefDetails/ObjectID/flt:ObjectReference" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>uprn</dfor:name> <dfor:value></dfor:value> </dfor:field> </dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:param name='propertyid' />
<xsl:template match="/"> <flt:FLPropertyID xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <flt:ObjectType>D3</flt:ObjectType> <flt:ObjectReference><xsl:value-of select="$propertyid" /></flt:ObjectReference> </flt:FLPropertyID> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>uprn</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//UPRN" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> </dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="flt">
<xsl:template match="/"> <flt:FLIndividualID> <flt:ObjectType>C1</flt:ObjectType> <flt:ObjectReference> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='person_search_results']/dfor:value" /> </flt:ObjectReference> </flt:FLIndividualID> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="flt"> <xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HasName</dfor:name> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']"> <dfor:value>true</dfor:value> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <dfor:value>false</dfor:value> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>txt_returnedCustomerID</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//BriefDetails/ObjectID/flt:ObjectReference" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>txt_customerid</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//flt:ObjectReference[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Title</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Title" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Forenames</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Forename[1]" /> <xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Forename[2]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Forename1</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Forename[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Forename2</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Forename[2]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Surname</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Surname" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Suffix1</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Suffix1" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Suffix2</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Suffix2" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Suffix3</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Suffix3" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-FullName</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Name[flt:Preferred = 'true']/FullName" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HasAddress</dfor:name> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//ContactPostals"> <dfor:value>true</dfor:value> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <dfor:value>false</dfor:value> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-AddressNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/AddressNumber" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <xsl:for-each select="//ContactPostals/AddressLine"> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-<xsl:value-of select="local-name()" /><xsl:value-of select="position()"/></dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="current()" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> </xsl:for-each> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Zipcode</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/Zipcode" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Postcode</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/Postcode" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-StateCode</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/StateCode" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-City</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/City" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-StateCode</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/StateCode" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-UPRN</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/UPRN" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Address</dfor:name> <dfor:value> <xsl:if test="//ContactPostals/AddressNumber != ''"><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/AddressNumber" />, </xsl:if><xsl:for-each select="//ContactPostals[flt:Preferred = 'true']/AddressLine"><xsl:if test="current() != ''"> <xsl:if test="position() != 1">,</xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="current()" /></xsl:if></xsl:for-each><xsl:if test="ContactPostals[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Zipcode != ''">,<xsl:value-of select="ContactPostals[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Zipcode" /></xsl:if> </dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-SubscribedAddress</dfor:name> <dfor:options> <xsl:for-each-group select="//ChildSet[Name='LGNOC_EXTERNAL_SERVICES']/Child" group-by="Value[*[1]='SERVICEREF'][*[2]]"> <xsl:if test="Value[*[1]='HIGHLIGHTVALUE1'][*[2]='Service Live'] and not(Value/Key['DELETEIND']/NumberValue)"> <dfor:option> <dfor:label> <xsl:value-of select="Value[*[1]='DESCRIPTION']/*[2]" /> </dfor:label> <dfor:value> <xsl:value-of select="concat(Value[*[1]='SERVICEREF']/*[2],'|',Value[*[1]='DESCRIPTION']/*[2],'|',Value[*[1]='HIGHLIGHTTYPE1']/*[2])" /> </dfor:value> <dfor:selected>false</dfor:selected> </dfor:option> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each-group> </dfor:options> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-AddressNoZipcode</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:if test="//ContactPostals/AddressNumber != ''"><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPostals/AddressNumber" />,</xsl:if><xsl:for-each select="//ContactPostals[flt:Preferred = 'true']/AddressLine"><xsl:if test="current() != ''"><xsl:if test="position() != 1">,</xsl:if><xsl:value-of select="current()" /></xsl:if></xsl:for-each></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-AddressLines</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:for-each select="//ContactPostals/AddressLine"><xsl:if test="current() != ''"><xsl:if test="position() != 1">,</xsl:if><xsl:value-of select="current()" /></xsl:if></xsl:for-each></dfor:value> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HasPhone</dfor:name> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//ContactPhones[flt:Preferred = 'true']"> <dfor:value>true</dfor:value> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <dfor:value>false</dfor:value> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-MobileNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[DeviceType = 'mobile']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-TelephoneNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[DeviceType = 'telephone']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-WorkMobileNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[DeviceType = 'mobile' and flt:Usage = 'work']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-WorkTelephoneNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[DeviceType = 'telephone' and flt:Usage = 'work']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HomeMobileNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[DeviceType = 'mobile' and flt:Usage = 'home']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HomeTelephoneNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[DeviceType = 'telephone' and flt:Usage = 'home']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-WorkNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[flt:Usage = 'work']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HomeNumber</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[flt:Usage = 'home']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Number</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactPhones[flt:Preferred = 'true']/Number[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HasEmail</dfor:name> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//ContactEmails[flt:Usage = 'work']"> <dfor:value>true</dfor:value> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <dfor:value>false</dfor:value> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-WorkEmail</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactEmails[flt:Usage = 'work']/EmailAddress[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-HomeEmail</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactEmails[flt:Usage = 'home']/EmailAddress[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Email</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//ContactEmails[flt:Preferred = 'true']/EmailAddress[1]" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field>
<dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-Gender</dfor:name> <dfor:value><xsl:value-of select="//Gender" /></dfor:value> </dfor:field> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>profile-PlaceOfBirth</dfor:name> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/">
<flt:FWTPropertySearch> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressnumber']/dfor:value != ''"> <AddressNumber><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressnumber']/dfor:value"/></AddressNumber> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='buildingname']/dfor:value != ''"> <BuildingName><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='buildingname']/dfor:value"/></BuildingName> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='streetname']/dfor:value != ''"> <StreetName><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='streetname']/dfor:value"/></StreetName> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='postcode']/dfor:value != ''"> <Postcode><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='postcode']/dfor:value"/></Postcode> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='uprn']/dfor:value != ''"> <UPRN><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='uprn']/dfor:value"/></UPRN> </xsl:if> </flt:FWTPropertySearch>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/">
<flt:FWTIndividualUpdate xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes"> <BriefDetails> <ObjectID> <flt:ObjectType>C1</flt:ObjectType> <!--1 to 3 repetitions:--> <flt:ObjectReference><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='customerID']/dfor:value" /></flt:ObjectReference> </ObjectID> <flt:ObjectDescription></flt:ObjectDescription> </BriefDetails> <Name> <IndividualNameDetails> <NameID><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='nameID']/dfor:value" /></NameID> <Title><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='Title']/dfor:value" /></Title> <Forename><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_first_name']/dfor:value" /></Forename> <Surname><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_last_name']/dfor:value" /></Surname> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> <!--0 to 10 repetitions:--> <!--UserDefined1:--> <UserDefined><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='PreferredContact']/dfor:value" /></UserDefined> <!--UserDefined2:--> <UserDefined><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='Mailings']/dfor:value" /></UserDefined> <!--UserDefined3:--> <UserDefined><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='PrefComms']/dfor:value" /></UserDefined> <!--UserDefined4:--> <UserDefined><xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='AgreeSurvey']/dfor:value" /></UserDefined>
</IndividualNameDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </Name> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='telephoneID']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPhones> <PhoneDetails> <PhoneID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='telephoneID']/dfor:value" /> </PhoneID> <Number> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='phone']/dfor:value" /> </Number> <DeviceType>Telephone</DeviceType> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </PhoneDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPhones> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <ContactPhones> <PhoneDetails> <PhoneID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='telephoneID']/dfor:value" /> </PhoneID> <Number> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='phone']/dfor:value" /> </Number> <DeviceType>Telephone</DeviceType> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </PhoneDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPhones> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='mobileID']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPhones> <PhoneDetails> <PhoneID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='mobileID']/dfor:value" /> </PhoneID> <Number> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='tel_mobile']/dfor:value" /> </Number> <DeviceType>Mobile</DeviceType> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>false</flt:Preferred> </PhoneDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPhones> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <ContactPhones> <PhoneDetails> <PhoneID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='mobileID']/dfor:value" /> </PhoneID> <Number> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='tel_mobile']/dfor:value" /> </Number> <DeviceType>Mobile</DeviceType> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>false</flt:Preferred> </PhoneDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPhones> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose>
<!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='emailID']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactEmails> <EmailDetails> <EmailID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='emailID']/dfor:value" /> </EmailID> <EmailAddress> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='email']/dfor:value" /> </EmailAddress> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </EmailDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactEmails> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <ContactEmails> <EmailDetails> <EmailID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='emailID']/dfor:value" /> </EmailID> <EmailAddress> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='email']/dfor:value" /> </EmailAddress> <flt:Usage>home</flt:Usage> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </EmailDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactEmails> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='num_p_streetnumber']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <AddressNumber> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='num_p_streetnumber']/dfor:value" /> </AddressNumber> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='num_p_streetnumber']/dfor:value = ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <AddressNumber></AddressNumber> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value = '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='num_p_streetnumber']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <AddressNumber> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='num_p_streetnumber']/dfor:value" /> </AddressNumber> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_streetname']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <AddressLine> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_streetname']/dfor:value" /> </AddressLine> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_streetname']/dfor:value = ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <AddressLine></AddressLine> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value = '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_streetname']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <AddressLine> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_streetname']/dfor:value" /> </AddressLine> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_town']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <City> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_town']/dfor:value" /> </City> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_town']/dfor:value = ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <City></City> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value = '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_town']/dfor:value = ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <City> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_town']/dfor:value" /> </City> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_postcode']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <Postcode> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_postcode']/dfor:value" /> </Postcode> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_postcode']/dfor:value = ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <Postcode></Postcode> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value = '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_postcode']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <Postcode> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_postcode']/dfor:value" /> </Postcode> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_uprn']/dfor:value !='' "> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <UPRN> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_uprn']/dfor:value" /> </UPRN> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_uprn']/dfor:value ='' "> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <UPRN></UPRN> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value = '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_uprn']/dfor:value !='' "> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <UPRN> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='txt_p_uprn']/dfor:value" /> </UPRN> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose>
<xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value != ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Update</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value = ''"> <ContactPostals> <PostalDetails> <AddressID> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='addressID']/dfor:value" /> </AddressID> <flt:Preferred>true</flt:Preferred> </PostalDetails> <flt:ListItemUpdateType>Insert</flt:ListItemUpdateType> </ContactPostals> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </flt:FWTIndividualUpdate> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/">
<dfor:form-data>
<dfor:field>
<dfor:name>txt_success</dfor:name> <dfor:value>Completed</dfor:value>
</dfor:field> </dfor:form-data>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <flt:FWTCaseUpdate xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes"> <flt:CaseReference> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='caseid']/dfor:value" /> </flt:CaseReference> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='final_title']/dfor:value != ''"> <!--Optional:--> <Title> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='final_title']/dfor:value" /> </Title> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='final_desc']/dfor:value != ''"> <!--Optional:--> <Description> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='final_desc']/dfor:value" /> </Description> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='obj_type']/dfor:value != '' and //dfor:field[dfor:name='obj_id']/dfor:value != ''"> <!--Optional:--> <AssociatedObject> <flt:ObjectType> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='obj_type']/dfor:value" /> </flt:ObjectType> <!--1 to 3 repetitions:--> <flt:ObjectReference> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='obj_id']/dfor:value" /> </flt:ObjectReference> </AssociatedObject> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='longitude']/dfor:value != ''"> <!--Optional:--> <XCoord> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='longitude']/dfor:value" /> </XCoord> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//dfor:field[dfor:name='latitude']/dfor:value != ''"> <!--Optional:--> <YCoord> <xsl:value-of select="//dfor:field[dfor:name='latitude']/dfor:value" /> </YCoord> </xsl:if> </flt:FWTCaseUpdate> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/"> <dfor:form-data><dfor:field> <dfor:name>update_log</dfor:name> <dfor:value>success</dfor:value> </dfor:field></dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/">
<dfor:form-data xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms"> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>output_log</dfor:name> <dfor:value>Subscribed</dfor:value> </dfor:field> </dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:flt="http://www.lagan.com/wsdl/FLTypes" xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms" exclude-result-prefixes="dfor">
<xsl:template match="/">
<dfor:form-data xmlns:dfor="http://kana.com/dforms"> <dfor:field> <dfor:name>output_log</dfor:name> <dfor:value>Already subscribed</dfor:value> </dfor:field> </dfor:form-data> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
